CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: CHI walks into the room followed by MOT
MOT wheels a carriage in the room with a baby in it
CHI looks up at the camera and then over at MOT
MOT is out of camera view
CHI walks out of camera view
sounds like MOT closes the door again
<bef> CHI walks across the room . CHI sits on the floor
MOT sits next to CHI and places the box on the floor
CHI puts his hand on the box
MOT turns the box so it faces CHI more
CHI starts to open the box
<2-5> MOT looks up at the baby
CHI looks up at the baby briefly
CHI starts to open the box
MOT holds the box and helps CHI remove the cover
CHI removes the cover and pulls the box down on the floor
MOT holds the cover and looks at the book
CHI takes the book out of the box and holds it up
MOT puts the cover on the box
CHI pulls the book onto his lap
<bef> MOT taps the top of the box . <4> MOT puts her hand on the book briefly
CHI looks up at MOT briefly and then down at the book
MOT pushes the box out of the way and moves closer to CHI
CHI puts the book on the floor
MOT points to the cover of the book and looks at CHI
CHI looks to where MOT is pointing
MOT continues to point to the cover
CHI looks at book . <aft> CHI smiles
MOT starts to turn the page and then stops
MOT points to the cover and looks at CHI
<aft> MOT drops the book and quickly recovers it
CHI looks at the book and pulls on his ankles
MOT points to the cover and looks at CHI
CHI looks at the book and pulls on his ankles
MOT opens the cover of the book
MOT looks at the book as she reads
CHI looks at the book and straightens his legs out
<1-2> MOT points to something on the previous page . <aft> MOT looks at CHI
CHI looks blankly at the page
MOT runs her finger over the page
CHI looks at the book as he moves his hand back and forth on the carpet
CHI waves both of his hands on the floor and glances up at his sister
CHI looks at the book with both hands behind his back
<aft> MOT puts her finger behind the page in preparation for turning it
<bef> CHI snaps the waistband of his shorts
CHI looks at the book and moves his legs back and forth restlessly
MOT is apologizing for misreading the line
MOT starts to open the box
MOT looks at CHI then at the box
MOT puts the book in the box
CHI turns and looks at MOT
MOT looks at CHI briefly and then up at the desk as she points to it
MOT gets up and walks to the desk
CHI glances behind him to make sure MOT is going to the desk
MOT puts the other box on the desk . MOT holds out the box to CHI
CHI takes the other end of the box and carries it over to the floor . CHI sits and begins to open the box
CHI opens his mouth wide in excitement
<$=1> CHI holds the puppet in front of him and looks at it closely
<aft> CHI puts the puppet on the floor
CHI puts his hand inside the puppet
CHI picks up the other puppet in the box
CHI looks in the direction of the baby briefly and then down at the puppet
CHI puts the puppet on his hand
the baby gurgles and grunts in the background
CHI moves the mouth of the puppet
MOT puts her hand in the mouth of the puppet
CHI closes the puppet's mouth around MOT's finger
CHI lets go of MOT's hand
<bef> MOT puts the other puppet on her hand
CHI rises up on his knees and attacks MOT with his puppet
MOT confronts CHI and then pulls the puppet to her chest
MOT puts her puppet on the box
CHI puts his puppet in the box . <aft> CHI stands up
MOT puts the cover on the box
CHI begins to wander around the room
CHI turns and looks at MOT as he puts his finger in his mouth
MOT holds the box out to CHI
MOT hands the box to CHI
<7-8> MOT nods . MOT looks at CHI
CHI takes the box from MOT and walks over to the desk
MOT goes out of camera view
MOT hands CHI the next box
CHI grabs the box . CHI runs over and puts the box down on the floor
<$=1> MOT kneels on the floor beside CHI
MOT takes the cover and puts it on the floor
CHI opens his mouth wide and then smiles
<bef> CHI takes the paper out of the box and puts it on the floor . CHI hands MOT a piece of paper
MOT takes the piece of paper from CHI and puts it on the floor in front of her
MOT moves out of camera view
CHI holds a piece of paper in each hand
CHI throws a piece of paper over by MOT and puts the other one in front of him
CHI looks down at the paper in front of him
<5-6> CHI looks up at MOT for approval
MOT picks up a crayon and leans down on the floor in front of CHI
MOT holds her crayon over the paper ready to draw
CHI switches hands and then starts to draw
CHI looks up at the baby with a look of concern
MOT goes out of camera view to attend the baby
<bef> CHI puts his crayon back in the box and picks up a different one . <aft> CHI draws on the paper
<bef> CHI stops drawing briefly . CHI continues to draw
CHI puts the crayon he had down and picks up two more out of the box and begins to color with both of them
MOT tries to calm the baby
<$=1> CHI holds up one of the crayons to MOT
CHI looks at the crayon on the floor beside him
CHI stands up and almost falls over .
CHI holds up a crayon for MOT to see and looks at MOT
the baby has stopped crying as MOT holds her on her lap
MOT reaches out to CHI and kneels on the floor
<bef> CHI walks over to MOT . CHI hands MOT a crayon
MOT takes the crayon from CHI
CHI kneels down on the floor
MOT is referring to her own square
MOT goes out of camera view
MOT puts down a crayon picks it up and then puts it down again
MOT takes a crayon out of the box and starts to draw
MOT holds the crayon out to CHI
MOT retracts the crayon and then holds it to CHI
CHI grabs the end of the crayon and pushes it to the paper
CHI holds onto the crayon as MOT draws
MOT and CHI continue to draw
MOT lets go of the crayon
CHI puts the crayon in the box and hold his crayon over the paper ready to draw
CHI looks at the paper and holds it to the floor with one hand
MOT picks up a crayon and her and CHi's pieces of paper
End of PCI Crayons and Paper
CHI stops drawing and puts his crayon in the box
MOT puts the paper in the box
CHI stands up and takes a few steps
MOT points to the cover of the box
CHI picks up the cover of the box and puts it on the box
MOT helps CHI with the cover
CHI tries to push the cover down
the cover is on the box the wrong way
CHI keeps pushing on the cover
MOT motions to the cover with her hand
CHI removes the cover and holds it
CHI turns the cover and drops it on the box
MOT still has the baby on her lap
CHI tries to push the cover down on the box
MOT motions to the cover with her hand
CHI bends over and looks at the box closely
MOT takes the cover and turns it the right way . MOT puts the cover on the box
CHI comes over and tries to force the box closed
MOT reaches down and fixes the box
CHI lets go of the box and takes a few steps back
MOT taps the top of the box
<1> MOT taps the top of the box twice
CHI picks up the box and carries it to the desk
MOT stands up and then walks to the desk
MOT is still holding the baby
CHI looks up at the desk and then down at the baby's carriage
CHI hands the box to MOT
MOT is out of camera view
MOT takes the last box off of the desk
MOT walks out of camera view
<aft> CHI dumps the contents of the box on the floor
CHI looks briefly in the box
MOT walks across the room and sets the house right side up
the baby is out of camera view and quiet
CHI comes over and sits next to the house
MOT bends down and opens up the house
<aft> MOT sits on the floor next to CHI
CHI starts to pick up the play people
CHI puts the play dog in the car
<bef> CHI reaches in the house and takes out the toy bed
MOT pulls the other things out of the house
CHI puts the toy bed back in the house
<aft> MOT pushes the house away from them
CHI puts the bed down by his side
<bef> MOT lays on her stomach and leans her head on her bent arm as she looks into the house
MOT looks into the house more intently
CHI crouches beside MOT and looks into the house
MOT points at something inside the house
CHI continues to look in the house
CHI pulls back and sits with his legs crossed
MOT taps her finger on the toy bed
CHI leans forward and looks at the bed
<bef> MOT points to the bed <6> MOT points to a room in the house . MOT looks at CHI
<1-5> MOT points to the bed . <6-8 .> MOT points to a room in the house

g.ga: put the bed in the room

u.a: MOT nods and points to the room as she looks at CHI
CHI takes the car with the play dog in it and tries to put it in the room
MOT's speech is unintelligible due to the baby's loud crying
MOT gets up and wheels the baby in the carriage
CHI puts a person in the car with the dog
outside voices are heard on the tape
CHI continues to play with the toys as he puts a person in the bed
CHI sits back and looks at what he has arranged
MOT sits on the floor next to CHI
CHI picks up the toy table and hits it against his hand
CHI looks at the table closely
CHI looks down at the toy table
<aft> CHI starts to put it down
MOT grabs the table out of CHI's hand
MOT sets the table on the floor
MOT puts the toy chairs around the table
MOT puts a toy chair in the house
MOT puts her hand on the toy car and moves it
MOT points to the toy table and then leans back
CHI starts pushing the toy car around
MOT walks out of camera view to attend the baby
CHI continues to move the car on the floor
MOT picks up the baby who is now quiet
CHI sits back and looks at the house
MOT squats down and points to the garage as she looks at CHI
CHI puts the car in the garage
CHI puts the car in the garage
MOT moves out of camera view with the baby
CHI reaches in the garage and removes the dog and the person from the car . CHI then pulls the car back out
CHI puts the dog and the person back in the car and puts it in the garage
MOT and baby are still out of camera view
CHI has the car in his hand and then puts it back in the garage
CHI reaches in the house a few times but never takes anything out
CHI sits and stares blankly at the house
CHI stares blankly at the house
MOT looks down at the baby as she gives her a bottle
CHI glances at the floor briefly
CHI picks up a person and holds it in front of MOT
CHI puts the person on the floor
CHI looks down on the floor
CHI's hands are out of camera view so it is not possible to tell what he is playing with
MOT rubs her hand on her skirt
CHI glances up at MOT quickly
CHI picks up a different person
MOT rocks back and forth gently as she watches CHI
<bef> CHI puts the person in the house and then immediately pulls it out
CHI bends over and looks closely at the house
MOT pulls the house closer to her and CHI and partially closes it
CHI sits back and looks at the house
CHI looks and scratches his head
MOT looks down at the baby
CHI puts the person in the room and then takes it out
<bef> CHI looks up at MOT . CHI looks at the house and shrugs his shoulders
CHI looks down at the person in his hand
MOT looks at the baby who is coughing
CHI gets on his knees and looks behind the house
CHI compares the two people in his hand
<bef> CHI puts one of the people in the house
CHI points to the person in the house
CHI leans back and then sits up
CHI picks up the bed and puts a person in it .
End of PCI - House . INV enters the room .
